attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do what he originally promised and LISTEN to the voice of The People.

The Republicans failed to do so and are history.

Right now the voice of The People is saying "Give us an election Gordon, its time to go"

Its time for someone with energy for change, not the same old robber baron tax scamming lefties

Fred from ex mining village

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
